metadata.title: CVE-2016-9969 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In libwebp 0.5.1, there is a double free bug in libwebpmux.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9969` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp7 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2
webp - 0.6.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtimageformats-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
godot package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
